featured.text: The speaker was Robot Redford, a robot who delivered the commencement address at a community college in suburban Maryland.
What is the speaker’s attitude toward the blood-type belief in Japan? (A) Negative.

The speaker, carefully programmed, arrived on the stage under its own power and proceeded to tell the audience of 658 graduates, their families, and friends that they would have to learn to work with robots and technology to solve society’s problems.

definition.en_def: A person who speaks, or a device that produces sound.
definition.example: The speaker at the conference shared valuable insights on climate change.
